DKDj presents ---------------------------------------------------------------------

THE (The) super mega blaster mix dance cd. Long forgotten, un-released and kept away from the quality hungry general public.

  UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. UNTIL NOW. 

For the first time since 2003, people outside the elitist circle of highly acclaimed Jakobsberg musicians can finally have a taste of the genius that is DKDj, through this insanely crazy super album. With smash hits such as "Tiperyghtah Six-15 (Keep walkin' funkeh with that curly hair of yours)" and "1, 2, 3, 1, Two Years Hot to Groove", EJAY MEGA MADNESS will probably be considered the best album this century. And the next.

Seriously though, dance that dance bitch and pump the bitch bass man!!! Hard core party! Yeah! Come on!
